article_title: Elkhart mayoral hopeful Tim Neese's service in Indiana House offers look into his style, approach and political disposition

article_metadata.description: Neese served 12 years in the House and he voted on hot-button issues like same-sex marriage, property tax caps, school vouchers and more.
